title: Studies for "Dissolution"
marks: All have a signature, date and chop mark LR: [Beyer 81], in graphite
description:
Most of the prints are identified by large narrative text (see below)
Plate 1. \"HONEY MAKE/SURE YOU/PULL OUT/IN TIME../I\'M NOT SAFE.\"
Plate 2. \"BLESS ME FATHER/FOR I HAVE SINNED/IT HAS BEEN/TWO WEEKS SINCE/MY LAST/CONFESSION. /SINCE THAT TIME/I HAVE ABUSED MYSELF 6 TIMES\"
Plate 3. \"PLEASE DON\'T/TELL MY/FAMILY. /I DIDN\'T KNOW/WHY I DID IT.\"
Plate 4. \"I\'D RATHER/DIE THAN HAVE/IT CUT OUT. /I WON\'T/SIGN ANYTHING.\"
Plate 5. \"NOBODY/PAYS/ANY/ATTENTION/TO/WHAT/I/SAY.\"
Plate 6. (No text; blank)
Plate 7. (No text; blank)
Plate 8. Side profile of a police officer pointing a gun (proof in black; no text)
Plate 9. Side profile of a police officer pointing a gun (proof in red; no text)
